Name: Chocolarita
Ingredients: 10 ml De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao
5 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of chocolate powder rim.
Review: As the name suggests - a Margarita with chocolate and coffee.
History: Adapted from a recipe discovered in 2005 at Agave, Hong Kong.
Nutrition: One serving of Chocolarita contains 204 calories
